ccre.cluck.tcp

Class CluckTCPServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread

        • ccre.net.ConnectionReceiverThread
          • ccre.cluck.tcp.CluckTCPServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class CluckTCPServer
extends ConnectionReceiverThread
    A server-side handler for Cluck TCP connections.

    • Method Detail

      • handleClient

        protected void handleClient(ClientSocket conn)
        Description copied from class: ConnectionReceiverThread
        Handle a client. This is ran in a new thread, so you don't need to worry about holding up other threads or accidentally terminating all connections if an error occurs. The connection will be closed automatically once this method returns or throws an error.
        Specified by:
        handleClient in class ConnectionReceiverThread
        Parameters:
        conn - The client connection.
